NPC ID5045

Kaqemeex (pronounced "cake mix") is a Guthixian druid who can be found in the Druid's circle in Taverley.

Kaqemeex is the start point of the quest Druidic Ritual, the quest required to start learning the skill of Herblore. During the quest, players learn that he is the master for Herblore. Players with level 99 in Herblore may buy the Herblore cape from him for 99,000 coins.

  • 2 Dialogue
  • 3 Changes
    • 3.1 Gallery (historical)

Stock[edit | edit source]

Note: If a player has multiple 99s, they will receive the trimmed variant of the cape instead.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 June 2015
(update)

The midsummer ritual and event will begin tomorrow. Make sure to head over to Kaqemeex in Taverly[sic] tomorrow to give him a helping hand.

Gallery (historical)[edit | edit source]
29 March 2004 –
18 October 2006 		18 October 2006 –
present

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Kaqemeex was the main NPC during the 2014 and 2015 Midsummer event, where players would solve Riddles given to them by Thordur, for rewards such as the half full wine jug and the untradeable druidic wreath. Players could also keep the disk of returning given to them by Thordur.
